live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39233.summary: Some customers in the Evergreen area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39233.title: July 5 – Saskatoon (Evergreen) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39232.summary: Some customers in South Lethbridge are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39232.title: July 5 – Lethbridge (South) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
